summary: a working woman stops running the household in order to make her husband and her three children appreciate her.
cast: Faith Ford|Tim Matheson|Florence Henderson|Spencer Breslin|Sarah Gadon|Daniel Magder|John Boylan|Janessa Crimi|Colin Glazer|Wendy Haller|Kevin Hanchard|Robert Lee|Angela Maiorano|Jacey Margolis|Andrew Popkevich|Jennifer Ricci|Sonja Smits|Megan Starkman|Juan Carlos Velis|Michael Sercerchi
title: Mamá en huelga
